trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> objects that can be individually accessed by index.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스를 사용하여 개별적으로 액세스할 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> 개체의 컬렉션을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> documentation.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스의 멤버에 설명 된 대로 정확히 동작 언급 했 듯이 점을 제외 하 고는 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>, 및 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 설명서입니다.

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection> class provides several special features: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection> objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Freezable 기능:** 에서 상속 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 클래스는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection> 클래스는 여러 가지 특수 기능을 제공: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection> 개선 하기 위해 읽기 전용으로 설정 하는 여러 개체 간에 공유 하는 대로 개체를 선언할 수 있습니다 성능, 복제 및 가집니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 제공 하는 다른 기능에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체 참조는 [Freezable 개체 개요](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: XAML Implicit Collection Usage
XAML Values
*oneOrMoreTransformKeyFrameObjectElements*
One or more <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform> objects, declared using object element syntax.
trans-unit.target: 하나 이상의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform> 개체 요소 구문을 사용 하 여 선언 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> class.
The collection whose items are copied to the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> class that contains items copied from the specified collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> objects and has the same initial capacity as the number of items copied.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> 개체 컬렉션에서 복사된 항목이 포함되어 있고 복사된 항목의 수와 같은 초기 용량을 가지는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="collection" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> objects that the collection is initially capable of storing.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 처음 저장할 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> 개체 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> class with the specified capacity.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 용량을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> to add to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.

Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to add a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: 일반적인 구현과 달리 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>,이 구현에서 throw 한 <xref:System.ArgumentException> 추가 하려고 하면는 **null** (**Nothing**) 참조 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> is read-only.
\- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> has a fixed size.
Removes all items from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.
This method does not change the capacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는의 용량을 변경 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> is read-only.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 이 개체 값의 전체 복사본을 만들어 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />의 수정 가능한 복제본을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을 복사하는 경우 이 메서드는 더 이상 확인되지 않을 수도 있는 리소스 참조와 데이터 바인딩을 복사하지만 애니메이션이나 애니메이션의 현재 값은 복사하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 소스의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 속성이 <see langword="true." />인 경우에도 복제된 개체의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 속성은 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복사본을 생성 하기 위해이 메서드는 고정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체 (또는 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 강력한 형식의 구현이 포함 된 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> 개체의 현재 값에 대한 전체 복사본을 만들어 이 개체의 수정 가능한 복제본을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 리소스 참조, 데이터 바인딩 및 애니메이션은 복사되지 않지만 이러한 요소의 현재 값은 복사됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 소스의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 속성이 <see langword="true" />인 경우에도 복제된 개체의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 속성은 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복사본을 생성 하기 위해이 메서드는 고정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체 (또는 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 강력한 형식의 구현이 포함 된 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.
Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" />에 포함되어 있는지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> is found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" />가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />에 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the items copied from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: <c>배열</c>에서 복사를 시작할 인덱스입니다. 이 인덱스는 0부터 시작합니다.

trans-unit.source: Copies the items of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> to an array, starting at the specified array index.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 배열 인덱스에서 시작하여 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />의 항목을 배열에 복사합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
<paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
-or-

The number of items in the source <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 소스 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />의 항목 수가 <paramref name="index" />에서 대상 <paramref name="array" /> 끝 사이의 사용 가능한 공간보다 큰 경우

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items contained in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.
The number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.
Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection.Enumerator" /> that can be used to iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.
Determines the index of the specified item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.
The index of <paramref name="value" /> if found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />에 <paramref name="value" />가 있으면 해당 값의 인덱스이고, 그렇지 않으면 -1입니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which <c>value</c> should be inserted.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.
Inserts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> at the specified index.

Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: 일반적인 구현과 달리 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>,이 구현은 throw는 <xref:System.ArgumentException> 를 삽입 하려고 시도 하는 경우는 **null** (**Nothing**) 참조 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> is read-only.
\- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> has a fixed size.
The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> to get or set.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 인덱스에 있는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" />를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> at the specified index.

Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: 일반적인 구현과 달리 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>,이 구현은 throw는 <xref:System.ArgumentException> 를 삽입 하려고 시도 하는 경우는 **null** (**Nothing**) 참조 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> is read-only.
\- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> has a fixed size.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.
Removes the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" />에서 맨 처음 발견되는 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />을 제거합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> was removed from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />에서 제거되었으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> is read-only.
\- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> has a fixed size.
The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> to remove.
Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> at the specified index.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.IsReadOnly" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />가 읽기 전용이면 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> interface.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the copied items from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.
The first position in the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to receive the copied contents.

<see langword="true" /> if access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Contains(System.Object)" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection" />에 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.
